backend/main.mo: Defines data types for residents, medications, vitals, MAR, ADL, insurance, and related records within the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Describes a feature report linking backend-based resident authorization and error handling to affected frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides manually written summaries of numerous frontend files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/docs/rollback-to-v46.md: Rollback guide detailing steps, checks, and validation for deploying Version 46 to production.
frontend/index.css: Defines global CSS variables and Tailwind base styles including light/dark theme color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Frontend HTML entry point with version meta tag, icons, manifest, and root app container.
frontend/public/site.webmanifest: Web app manifest specifying name, icons, theme colors, and standalone display mode.
frontend/public/version.txt: Contains the version marker '46' for deployment verification.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup configuring QueryClient, routes, and authentication gate.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedGa: Authentication wrapper handling login flow, backend reachability, and profile bootstrap before rendering the app.
Displays the brand logo with multiple fallback URL variants and an initials fallback if all image loads fail.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShel: Provides the main application layout with header, navigation, footer, and sign-out handling.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiNav.tsx: Renders the Maui navigation bar with active state highlighting for main routes.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/A: Dialog for creating a new resident with extensive form fields, validation handling, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/a: Dialog form for creating a new ADL record with date, activity, assistance level, and notes.
Displays a resident's ADL record history with sorting and delete support.
Re-exports ADL dialog and history list components.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/E: Dialog for editing resident information, supporting dynamic lists and validation with save callbacks.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/m: Dialog form for adding a MAR record tied to an active medication and administration details.
Re-exports MAR dialog and history list components.
Shows a resident’s MAR history with formatted timestamps and delete functionality.
Dialog for adding a medication with dosage, route, times, prescriber, and notes.
Form dialog for editing an existing medication, handling validation, route/physician selection, and submission.
Re-exports medication-related components for easier imports.
Displays a medication’s details with status badges and action controls for editing or state changes.
Select component for choosing a prescribing physician, with fallback disabled input if none exist.
Select component for medication administration route, supporting predefined routes and custom 'other' input.
Provides edit, discontinue/resume, and delete actions for a medication with confirmation dialogs.
Top-level medications tab listing medications and providing an add-medication entry point.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/R: Card UI showing key resident details with actions to view profile, toggle status, and delete.
Header bar for the resident dashboard with title and add-resident action button.
UI controls for filtering residents by room and sorting by various attributes.
Responsive grid listing ResidentCards or a fallback message when no residents match filters.
Displays key resident metrics including totals, active count, and discharged count in KPI cards.
Renders tab controls for filtering residents by status (All, Active, Discharged).
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/v: Dialog for recording daily vitals, validating inputs, converting temperature units, and submitting to backend.
Displays a resident’s vitals history with sorting, formatting, oxygen status indicators, and delete handling with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/references/Missi: Shows a placeholder card listing missing reference materials with categories and items plus a link to the full checklist.
frontend/src/components/startup/BackendR: Gates app rendering until the backend health check succeeds, showing loading or error states with retry options.
frontend/src/components/startup/ProfileB: Ensures a user profile is loaded or created before rendering children, handling loading, retry, and error flows.
frontend/src/hooks/residentQueryKeys.ts: Provides factory functions generating scoped React Query keys for resident directory data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReady.ts: Exposes a boolean indicating when the backend actor and identity are fully initialized and ready for queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useHealthCheck.ts: Runs a timed backend health check using an anonymous actor and exposes status states for reachability gating.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing identity loading, login, logout, and status via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, residents directory, and related backend operations with error translation and fallbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, light/dark theme CSS variables, and specialized print styles for reports.
frontend/src/lib/backendErrorMessage.ts: Maps backend error messages to user-friendly text, handling permission, not-found, inactive, and network errors.
frontend/src/lib/brand.ts: Exports branding constants including the facility name and logo path.
frontend/src/lib/medicationRoutes.ts: Defines medication route options and utilities for converting between backend route types, UI select values, and display labels.
frontend/src/lib/medications.ts: Utility helpers for updating, deleting, toggling, filtering, and generating IDs for medication records.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a cn() helper that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/maui/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard for viewing, filtering, sorting, and managing residents using directory data and backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/mockRe: Provides mock medication data for residents, with a special case for resident ID 3.
Defines mock resident profile structure and returns fallback profile data when backend data is unavailable.
Contains a static list of mock residents with summary info like age, room, and medication counts.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/reside: Utility functions for calculating and formatting a resident's age from a birthdate string.
Transforms backend resident records into UI-friendly view models with calculated age and formatted room strings.
Utility helpers for filtering, sorting, and computing KPIs for lists of resident view models.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/Reside: Main resident profile page that loads resident data, manages dialogs for vitals/meds/ADLs, and handles editing and printing actions.
Print‑optimized component that renders resident demographic and medication information for reports.
frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzRefe: UI page outlining required reference materials and screenshots needed to recreate the Maui Lane Care Home interface.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store and retrieve them in sessionStorage, and clear them from session or the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and fonts while enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including known issues, existing features, and a pending feature request about cross-user resident visibility.
